CS559 HW5 Rope&Cloth Simulation

Fangjun Zhou

EDITOR INSTRUCTION

You can directly open White Dwarf Editor below without hosting any server. But to open a world file, you need to download one of the world files from the link below and open it in the editor.

1. Download rope_world.json or cloth_world.json.
2. Open the downloaded file in the editor.
3. Right click to rotate views. Use scroll wheel to zoom in and out. Use middle click to move camera.
4. Change the mode on the top right corner from "move" to "view", now you can use left click to move the camera.

White Dwarf Editor

RELEASE INSTRUCTION

The following release versions need file permission. So you may not be able to access it locally. You can host a server via VSCode Live Server or Python http server. OR YOU CAN ACCESS THE ONLINE VERSION HERE!!!

Use left click to select and move objects.
Right click to rotate views.
Use scroll wheel to zoom in and out.
Use middle click to move camera.

Rope Simulation

Cloth Simulation
